attributes.action: Tax all vampires and vampiric related items
attributes.additional_details:
A tax upon all Vampires and Vampiric items would bring in £10's if not Millions of pounds for the UK economy. With the present Goverments policy of increasing taxes, surely I'm not the only one thing the current obession with Vampires and all things related would be a boon. Perhaps a portion of the proceeds could go to the blood donor service?
Werewolves should remain tax exempt.
